text: â€˜And I will take the remnant of Judah who have set their faces to go into the land of Egypt to dwell there, and they shall all be consumed  and  fall in the land of Egypt. They shall be consumed by the sword  and  by famine. They shall die, from the least to the greatest, by the sword and by famine; and they shall be an oath, an astonishment, a curse and a reproach!
